title: Ages in BP
description: Regular expression for dates and date ranges using a (before present) timescale.

title: Decimal Degrees
description: Regular expression for decimal degrees reported in articles.
Age ranges with ages measured in years.

title: Supplemental material
description: Very general search for a reference to supplemental material.

title: Supplemental material
description: Look for a reference to supplementary material in a document.

title: Find DOIs in text
description: Matches DOIs in papers, described in https://www.crossref.org/blog/dois-and-matching-regular-expressions/
